Question
========
How can you keep sensitive files out of a GitHub repository?

Answerlist
----------
* Store them in the docs folder
* Rename the files to start with a dot
* Keep them outside the repo and add patterns to .gitignore
* Push them once, then delete them

Solution
========
Sensitive files should stay outside the repo, and .gitignore prevents tracking.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
